scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build:images: npm run build:server-image && npm run build:client-image
scripts.push:images: docker push thinkinginreact/todo_server:latest && docker push thinkinginreact/todo_app:latest
scripts.build:push: npm run build:server-image && npm run build:client-image && npm run push:images
